text: Heiderose Berroth (2 June 1947 – 13 September 2022) was a German politician. She was in the Free Democratic Party. She was in the Landtag of Baden- Württemberg from 1996 to 2011. Berroth was born in Stuttgart, Germany. Berroth died on 13 September 2022. She was 75 years old. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Stuttgart
title: Heiderose Berroth
